newsitem.title: USA: Hannaford Bros July sales/revs rose 5.6 pct.
newsitem.headline: Hannaford Bros July sales/revs rose 5.6 pct.

text.p: Hannaford Bros. said Friday its sales and other revenues for the four weeks ended July 26 rose 5.6 percent to $257.7 million, from $243.99 million in the same period last year.
The food retailer said sales and other revenues for the 30 weeks ended July 26 increased 7.8 percent, to $1.793 billion from $1.664 billion in the same period in 1996.
